attributes.action: bring back Crusha lime milk shake mix.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain has long been regarded as a nation of individuals who have striven for perfection, often against the advice of others. This dogged determination to swim against the tide for the better good of society has made us who we are. For this reason, and the fact that for those in the know there is just NO substitute, we urge the Prime Minister to bring back lime milk shake and not to succumb to the stereotypical choice of strawberry, chocolate, or vanilla only. Please let us maintain our right to be different and green!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
